Text: For example, a quarter of the Chinese production capacity used by global sportswear brands is lying idle, according to an industry source, as the trade war pushes the biggest labels out of the Chinese factories.
Cause: the trade war pushes the biggest labels out of the Chinese factories.
Effect: For example, a quarter of the Chinese production capacity used by global sportswear brands is lying idle, according to an industry source
Sentence: <e2>For example, a quarter of the Chinese production capacity used by global sportswear brands is lying idle, according to an industry source</e2>, as <e1>the trade war pushes the biggest labels out of the Chinese factories.</e1>
